thread.title: Salman Khan gets sporty
thread.title_full: Salman Khan gets sporty - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Salman Khan gets sporty
text:
A picture of Salman Khan dancing around with a football in the song 'Tod Tadaiyya' from Prem Ratan Dhan Payo , has recently been doing the rounds on social media.
READ: Prem Ratan Dhan Payo: Lesser known facts
Ahmed Khan had earlier confirmed choreographing this 13-minute long song, which has Salman showing off his football skills in a sherwani , added with the iconic 'Prem' charm.
